title: thenightalive
author: thenightalive
content: How much worth of bitcoin you are holding? BTC & what is your future plan on next bullrun?

comments.author: Mia Chloe
comments.body: Privacy! Privacy!! Privacy!!!Sometimes privacy requires simple instincts or as some would say "Common sense".I don't think anyone would be so stupid enough to come here and give such information.Quote from: thenightalive on February 05, 2024, 07:47:05 PMBTC & what is your future plan on next bullrun?And I guess this part is just a disguise to make it look like a normal discussion right?

comments.author: thenightalive
comments.body: Quote from: Mia Chloe on February 05, 2024, 07:50:23 PMPrivacy! Privacy!! Privacy!!!Sometimes privacy requires simple instincts or as some would say "Common sense".I don't think anyone would be so stupid enough to come here and give such information.Quote from: thenightalive on February 05, 2024, 07:47:05 PMBTC & what is your future plan on next bullrun?And I guess this part is just a disguise to make it look like a normal discussion right? I didn't mean that deep as you thinking. Here we all are anonymous, so just normally asked. I didn't ask anyones private key, so please stop attacking personally. Take it easy.

comments.author: Mia Chloe
comments.body: Quote from: thenightalive on February 05, 2024, 07:54:55 PMI didn't mean that deep as you thinking. Here we all are anonymous, so just normally asked. I didn't ask anyones private key, so please stop attacking personally. Take it easy.Probably you met no harm. But let me give you a little hint. Have you heard or read about dust attacks?Now disclosing your hodlings could help trace your wallet and promote the easy for a dust attack.Aside from being careful about your seed phrase and private keys you also need to be careful how you share information like hodlings and even the wallet address of your hodling wallet.I recommend you check these post outWhy it’s important to avoid telling everyone about your crypto holdingsDust Attack, what it is, why it is dangerous and how to prevent falling to it

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: Quote from: thenightalive on February 05, 2024, 07:47:05 PMHow much worth of bitcoin you are holding? BTC & what is your future plan on next bullrun?a. enoughb. ride the waves.. sell high(near ATH 2025), buy low.(near 2026 correction)

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: No, OP, I'm not going to disclose how much BTC I have. You don't really need to know it. I doubt that you would tell to random strangers on streets how much savings you have. Plan for next bull run? Honestly, haven't thought about it at all. Maybe I'm not going to do anything .Quote from: Mia Chloe on February 05, 2024, 08:06:43 PMProbably you met no harm. But let me give you a little hint. Have you heard or read about dust attacks?Now disclosing your hodlings could help trace your wallet and promote the easy for a dust attack.Aside from being careful about your seed phrase and private keys you also need to be careful how you share information like hodlings and even the wallet address of your hodling wallet.I recommend you check these post outWhy it’s important to avoid telling everyone about your crypto holdingsDust Attack, what it is, why it is dangerous and how to prevent falling to itDisclosing how much BTC you hold can make into target of scammers, possibly phishing attacks and similar stuff. But didn't thought about thing like dust attack. Yeah, it sounds a bit complex, but possible.
